txt.en: Quickbeam has asked you to quiet the forest south of the Easeful Mead.
Quickbeam is at Derndingle in south-east Fangorn.
Insects have swarmed the forest and built mounds
Tend the forest south of the Easeful Mead
Gredbyg are infesting the forest south of the Easeful Mead

'When we marched on Isengard, the forest was awoken. It is very angry with the actions of the wizard we trusted. Too angry, I cannot calm it myself.\n\n'Please tend the forest south of the Easeful Mead.'
Mounds of insects have swarmed the forest south of the Fallen Tree
Quieting South of the Easeful Mead
When the Ents decided to march to war, the forest awoke, angry and betrayed. With Isengard destroyed, Quickbeam is attempting to calm Fangorn and quiet it once more.
